dc_title_s: Westmorlandia, Lancastria, Cestria, Caernarvan, Denbigh, Flint, Merionidh, Montgomery, Salopia Cum insulis Mania Et Anglesey
dc_description_s: Date range from Dutch editions of Mercator's Atlas or A geographicke description of the regions, countries and kingdomes of the world ..., from which map likely is.; Relief shown pictorially.; Bar scale in Miliaria Mediocria Angliae.; Page numbers from verso: 27, 28.; Book plate on verso dates item 1633.|34 x 40 centimeters, on sheet 47 x 56 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,000,000|General Map Collection
